hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.subtitle: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. Learn how we collect, use, and safeguard your data.

introduction.title: Our Commitment to Your Privacy
introduction.content: At Vision Studio, we specialize in aerial photography, commercial photography, and video production. We are committed to maintaining the confidentiality of your personal information and protecting it from any unauthorized use. Whether you visit our website, book a service, or contact us, rest assured that your data is secure.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
items: Name, email address, phone number, and project details
Files, images, or documents you send during communication or booking
Indirect information such as IP address and browser type (via cookies)

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
items: To confirm bookings and provide services accurately and professionally
To respond to your inquiries and provide technical support
To send promotional offers or discount notifications (only with your consent)

dataSharing.title: Information Sharing
items: We never sell or share your data with third parties
Exceptions include payment processors or delivery services when necessary for service provision
Legal requirements under official or legal orders
dataSharing.important: We never sell your personal information to third parties.

dataSecurity.title: Data Protection
items: We implement technical and administrative security measures
Your information is protected from unauthorized access, use, or modification
We use industry-standard encryption and security protocols

consent.title: Your Consent
items: By using this website or sending personal data through it, you agree to this privacy policy
You consent to our use of your information as outlined above
You can withdraw your consent at any time by contacting us

contact.title: Questions About Privacy?
contact.subtitle: If you have any questions about our privacy policy, don't hesitate to contact us.
